sellerCard.oneLiner: Certified UX UI Designer, Web Design, Figma and Mobile Design

description.content:
Hello Fiverr Community,


Thank you so much for reaching out to my Website Development GIG. I'm excited to be a part of your online journey.


My name is Hadid Manna, and I am a full stack developer with over three years of experience. I can build, rebuild, and develop a fully functional, responsive website from scratch or redesign your existing site or blog to meet your unique needs.



What I Offer in this GIG:


  • Fully Functional Custom Website Development
  • Figma to Website Conversion
  • Frontend Development with React.Js
  • Backend Development, Rest API Creation
  • Attractive Layout with Color Combination
  • Integrate API
  • Fully Responsive (Mobile+Tablet+Desktop) Design
  • SEO + Speed Optimization + Google Analytics Setup
  • eCommerce Functionality
  • Setup Any Payment Gateway
  • Live Chat & Bug Fixing
  • Social Media Integration



Why Do You Hire Me?


  • Experienced Full Stack Developer
  • High-Quality Work and On-time Delivery
  • 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
  • Quick Response
  • Free Support for 30 Days



Let's start working together to build a professional website that truly represents your brand identity with style and functionality! Just click on the 'Contact Me' button to get started.

slide.name: build, rebuild website development as full stack developer, front end developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: What should you need to start developing a website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need the project details, Logo, and Content (text, images, videos, etc.) for each page, as well as reference website links or designs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your experience in Website Development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I've worked as a full-stack web developer for the past 03 years and have successfully built more than 150 custom websites for individuals, small businesses, and corporations.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will all pages be responsive and mobile-friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, all the pages are super responsive, mobile-friendly, and support all devices and browsers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you redesign an existing website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can. I will redesign, customize, or fix errors in an existing website according to your requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you assist once the order is completed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I'll provide you with 30 days of free support after completing the order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide source code?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you will receive a well-documented script and instructions on how to manipulate parameters.

packageList.title: Figma to Website Conversion
packageList.description: Convert your Figma design into a beautiful, modern, responsive custom website.

packageList.title: Business Package (Custom Site)
packageList.description: Build 5 Pages of Dynamic, Functional Custom Website With Fully Responsive Design for Your Business.

packageList.title: Premium Website Design
packageList.description: Build 8 Pages of Dynamic, Functional Custom Website + Responsive Design for Startup Business.

reviews.comment: Hadid is an excellent website developer.  excellent results. he is a very sincere and honest person to work with. If you're looking for a top-performing WordPress developer who you can trust, then look no further. Hadid is the best developer

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback. It was a pleasure to work with you.

reviews.comment: It took almost two weeks to build a one page web site . I had to get him to change the mistakes three or four times. I wouldn't recommend this guy to anyone ..

Working with Hadid went smoothly. He responded and got in touch with us within a very short time. The project was a no-brainer because he knew what we wanted and followed our company identity. Perfect work!!!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words and positive feedback! It was a pleasure working with you, and I‚Äôm glad to hear that the project met your expectations. Understanding your vision and aligning it with your company‚Äôs identity was my top priority. I look forward to collaborating with you again in the future!

reviews.comment: I had a great consultation with Hadid. He is a friendly and cooperative individual. He even extended the session to ensure we covered all the topics and shared some impressive work done by his team. The discussion on custom development was productive as well

seller_response.comment: Thanks for the appreciation. I always deliver as promised and more always.

reviews.comment: Hadid is awesome. An incredibly diligent worker will always clarify to ensure the results are exactly what are being asked for, and communication is clear and timely. he's helped with creative solutions for the website issues. Thank you

seller_response.comment: Your welcome, Such a Gentleman, Thank you.
